title: Pakistan stand-off over cops seeking army exit from restive province drags on
content: In northwestern Pakistan, police units are striking to demand the withdrawal of military and intelligence agencies from their region. They accuse these forces of interfering in their duties and worsening security conditions. The protest has led to blocked highways and increased tensions, with no signs of resolution so far.
summary: In northwestern Pakistan, police units are striking to demand the withdrawal of military and intelligence agencies from their region. They accuse these forces of interfering in their duties and worsening security conditions. The protest has led to blocked highways and increased tensions, with no signs of resolution so far.

title: Donald Trump says there will be no third debate, Kamala wants one because...
content: Donald Trump stated he will not engage in another debate with Kamala Harris, referencing a poll indicating his victory. He criticized ABC moderators for perceived bias. While Harris's campaign seeks another debate in October, Trump's team maintains they have already agreed to three debates, questioning the need for more. Donald Trump debated with President Joe Biden on CNN which was the first debate of this presidential election.
summary: Donald Trump stated he will not engage in another debate with Kamala Harris, referencing a poll indicating his victory. He criticized ABC moderators for perceived bias. While Harris's campaign seeks another debate in October, Trump's team maintains they have already agreed to three debates, questioning the need for more. Donald Trump debated with President Joe Biden on CNN which was the first debate of this presidential election.

title: Donald Trump likes Laura Loomer, she might be behind 'Kamala Harris Indian or Black' attack: Report
content: ​According to a CNN report, several people close to Trump said Loomer has contributed to some of the "unseemly conspiracy theories Trump has elevates since Harris replaced Biden on the ticket". It was Laura who accused Kamala Harris of hiding her Black heritage and that eventually landed up with Donald Trump. "Others pushed back on the notion she was behind Trump's remarks.
summary: ​According to a CNN report, several people close to Trump said Loomer has contributed to some of the "unseemly conspiracy theories Trump has elevates since Harris replaced Biden on the ticket". It was Laura who accused Kamala Harris of hiding her Black heritage and that eventually landed up with Donald Trump. "Others pushed back on the notion she was behind Trump's remarks.

title: Bush's attorney general says 'I can't sit quietly', endorses Kamala Harris
content: Gonzales said he spoke with Trump only once and does not really know him. "It is telling, however, that several senior officials who worked for him in the White House now refuse to support him, including his vice president, chief of staff, defense secretary and national security adviser. Their unwillingness to endorse their former boss is an indictment of his character at a level equal to his many, many criminal indictments," he wrote.
summary: Gonzales said he spoke with Trump only once and does not really know him. "It is telling, however, that several senior officials who worked for him in the White House now refuse to support him, including his vice president, chief of staff, defense secretary and national security adviser. Their unwillingness to endorse their former boss is an indictment of his character at a level equal to his many, many criminal indictments," he wrote.

title: In the (y)ear of conspiracy theories, Trump hears insults galore
content: Kamala Harris decisively outperformed Donald Trump in the presidential debate, sparking baseless conspiracy theories among MAGA supporters. Despite Trump's insistence on winning, consensus points to his defeat. Celebrity endorsements for Harris and criticism from notable figures have weakened Trump's campaign, with even some Republicans questioning his capability to be in office.
summary: Kamala Harris decisively outperformed Donald Trump in the presidential debate, sparking baseless conspiracy theories among MAGA supporters. Despite Trump's insistence on winning, consensus points to his defeat. Celebrity endorsements for Harris and criticism from notable figures have weakened Trump's campaign, with even some Republicans questioning his capability to be in office.

title: Bomb threat at Springfield after Republicans spread conspiracy theory about Haitian immigrants
content: Several establishments at Ohio's Springfield including the Springfield City Hall Thursday received bomb threat. Police confirmed the threats and said that some buildings were being evacuated due to an unspecified threat. The threat came as Republicans push conspiracy theories that Haitian immigrants who have settled at Springfield are stealing the pets of other residents and eating cats and ducks.
summary: Several establishments at Ohio's Springfield including the Springfield City Hall Thursday received bomb threat. Police confirmed the threats and said that some buildings were being evacuated due to an unspecified threat. The threat came as Republicans push conspiracy theories that Haitian immigrants who have settled at Springfield are stealing the pets of other residents and eating cats and ducks.

title: Melania Trump shares Barron's childhood photo in latest promotion for her memoir
content: In a new promotional video for her memoir, Melania Trump shared unseen childhood photos of Barron Trump and discussed the challenges and rewards of motherhood. Barron Trump is very popular mostly because of his height of 6 feet 8 inches that makes him stand out wherever he goes. Though his childhood remained under the shrouds of secrecy, Barron is more visible now and debuted at his father's rally this election campaign.
summary: In a new promotional video for her memoir, Melania Trump shared unseen childhood photos of Barron Trump and discussed the challenges and rewards of motherhood. Barron Trump is very popular mostly because of his height of 6 feet 8 inches that makes him stand out wherever he goes. Though his childhood remained under the shrouds of secrecy, Barron is more visible now and debuted at his father's rally this election campaign.

title: Donald Trump's debate performance was not his worst but...: GOP pollster Frank Luntz
content: While Donald Trump insists that he on the debate against Kamala Harris though polls show otherwise, Trump ally RFK Jr told Fox News that Harris has clearly won the debate. “Vice President Harris clearly won the debate in terms of her delivery, polish, organization, and preparation,” RFK Jr said without any pretence.
summary: While Donald Trump insists that he on the debate against Kamala Harris though polls show otherwise, Trump ally RFK Jr told Fox News that Harris has clearly won the debate. “Vice President Harris clearly won the debate in terms of her delivery, polish, organization, and preparation,” RFK Jr said without any pretence.

title: Friendly nations helped Pakistan meet IMF bailout conditions, says PM Shehbaz Sharif
content: Pakistan is set to receive a $7 billion IMF bailout package after fulfilling required conditions with help from friendly nations. The loan aims to alleviate economic distress through stringent reforms and increased revenue. With external debt exceeding $130 billion, financial experts express concerns about the inflationary impact of Pakistan’s debt-driven fiscal deficit management.
summary: Pakistan is set to receive a $7 billion IMF bailout package after fulfilling required conditions with help from friendly nations. The loan aims to alleviate economic distress through stringent reforms and increased revenue. With external debt exceeding $130 billion, financial experts express concerns about the inflationary impact of Pakistan’s debt-driven fiscal deficit management.

title: Harvey Weinstein charged with additional crimes during hearing on rape charges
content: Former movie producer Harvey Weinstein has been indicted on new charges, according to a New York prosecutor. Prosecutors intend to retry him and file additional charges related to "violent sexual assaults" involving more women who will testify. A tentative trial date is scheduled for November 12. Previously convicted of rape in February 2020, his conviction was overturned in April.
summary: Former movie producer Harvey Weinstein has been indicted on new charges, according to a New York prosecutor. Prosecutors intend to retry him and file additional charges related to "violent sexual assaults" involving more women who will testify. A tentative trial date is scheduled for November 12. Previously convicted of rape in February 2020, his conviction was overturned in April.

title: 'Am I half a childless cat lady?': After Taylor Swift, Linda Ronstadt endorses Kamala Harris
content: "Trump first ran for President warning about rapists coming in from Mexico. I'm worried about keeping the rapist out of the White House," singer Linda Ronstadt's statement of endorsing Kamala Harris and Tim Walz read. She added a post script for JD Vance where she informed him that though she adopted and raised two children who are now grown ups, she never married and lives with a cat.
summary: "Trump first ran for President warning about rapists coming in from Mexico. I'm worried about keeping the rapist out of the White House," singer Linda Ronstadt's statement of endorsing Kamala Harris and Tim Walz read. She added a post script for JD Vance where she informed him that though she adopted and raised two children who are now grown ups, she never married and lives with a cat.

title: Elon Musk's daughter calls father 'abhorrent' for offering Taylor Swift 'a child'
content: Taylor Swift's endorsement for Kamala Harris moments after the presidential debate was one of the biggest moments of the US election 2024. But it also became one of the most controversial moments as Elon Musk actually offered a child to Taylor Swift. Elon Musk's daughter Viviana Jenna Wilson who disowned Elon as the father earlier called out Elon and said the post was sexist, abhorrent and nobody should be talked like that.
summary: Taylor Swift's endorsement for Kamala Harris moments after the presidential debate was one of the biggest moments of the US election 2024. But it also became one of the most controversial moments as Elon Musk actually offered a child to Taylor Swift. Elon Musk's daughter Viviana Jenna Wilson who disowned Elon as the father earlier called out Elon and said the post was sexist, abhorrent and nobody should be talked like that.

title: Laura Loomer's 'curry joke' on Kamala Harris gets thumbs down from MAGA stalwart: 'Extremely racist'
content: As a major controversy broke out with Greene claiming that Laura Loomer does not represent MAGA but Loomer was travelling with Donald Trump, it was a Laura versus Greene on X. Laura said she won't delete her post and questioned whether having a sense of humor is a crime in America. Marjorie said she needs to take responsibility for making Trump look bad with her 'curry smell' racist attack on Kamala Harris.
summary: As a major controversy broke out with Greene claiming that Laura Loomer does not represent MAGA but Loomer was travelling with Donald Trump, it was a Laura versus Greene on X. Laura said she won't delete her post and questioned whether having a sense of humor is a crime in America. Marjorie said she needs to take responsibility for making Trump look bad with her 'curry smell' racist attack on Kamala Harris.

title: At least quarter of Gaza wounded have 'life-changing injuries': WHO
content: The World Health Organization reveals that at least a quarter of those injured in Gaza's conflict have life-changing injuries requiring extensive rehabilitation. Over 22,500 people need long-term care. With only 17 out of 36 hospitals partially functional, immediate and sustained support is crucial to meet the overwhelming healthcare needs in the area.
summary: The World Health Organization reveals that at least a quarter of those injured in Gaza's conflict have life-changing injuries requiring extensive rehabilitation. Over 22,500 people need long-term care. With only 17 out of 36 hospitals partially functional, immediate and sustained support is crucial to meet the overwhelming healthcare needs in the area.

title: 'Something was catastrophically wrong': Alaska Airlines pilot recalls moments when plane's door blew out
content: An Alaska Airlines pilot managed to land a Boeing 737 Max 9 safely after a door panel blew out mid-flight. The emergency happened shortly after takeoff from Portland, necessitating an urgent return to the airport. Although there were no fatalities, three passengers sustained minor injuries. A lawsuit has been filed against Alaska Airlines and Boeing.
summary: An Alaska Airlines pilot managed to land a Boeing 737 Max 9 safely after a door panel blew out mid-flight. The emergency happened shortly after takeoff from Portland, necessitating an urgent return to the airport. Although there were no fatalities, three passengers sustained minor injuries. A lawsuit has been filed against Alaska Airlines and Boeing.

title: 'It’s on video on internet': Musk reshares Harris' old video backing gender transition surgeries in prison
content: A resurfaced 2019 video features Vice President Kamala Harris advocating taxpayer-funded gender transition surgeries for prisoners, drawing criticism from former President Donald Trump. During a recent debate, Harris reaffirmed her support for comprehensive medical treatment for transgender individuals relying on state care, emphasizing the importance of access to necessary surgical procedures.
summary: A resurfaced 2019 video features Vice President Kamala Harris advocating taxpayer-funded gender transition surgeries for prisoners, drawing criticism from former President Donald Trump. During a recent debate, Harris reaffirmed her support for comprehensive medical treatment for transgender individuals relying on state care, emphasizing the importance of access to necessary surgical procedures.

title: Model Maecee Lathers seen face down, topless and vomiting in Miami after crash that killed 2
content: Maecee Lathers, a social media model from New York, faces serious charges for allegedly causing a fatal crash in Miami while under the influence of 'pink cocaine.' The incident resulted in two deaths and one injury. Disoriented at the scene, she attempted to flee and made bizarre statements. Her pretrial hearing is scheduled for September 16.
summary: Maecee Lathers, a social media model from New York, faces serious charges for allegedly causing a fatal crash in Miami while under the influence of 'pink cocaine.' The incident resulted in two deaths and one injury. Disoriented at the scene, she attempted to flee and made bizarre statements. Her pretrial hearing is scheduled for September 16.

title: Norfolk Southern fires CEO and Indian origin lawyer over 'inappropriate relationship'
content: Norfolk Southern Corporation dismissed CEO Alan Shaw and terminated Executive Vice President Nabanita C Nag after discovering their inappropriate relationship. Mark R George has been appointed as the new President and CEO, effective immediately. Jason A Zampi will serve as acting Chief Financial Officer during this transition period.
summary: Norfolk Southern Corporation dismissed CEO Alan Shaw and terminated Executive Vice President Nabanita C Nag after discovering their inappropriate relationship. Mark R George has been appointed as the new President and CEO, effective immediately. Jason A Zampi will serve as acting Chief Financial Officer during this transition period.

title: 'Hunting for a woman alone': Homeless man stabbed US student 46 times
content: Shawn Laval Smith, a homeless man, has been convicted for the brutal murder of UCLA student Brianna Kupfer in 2022. He stabbed her 46 times while she worked alone in a Los Angeles furniture store. The jury found him guilty of murder and using a deadly weapon. A sanity phase will now determine his mental state during the attack.
summary: Shawn Laval Smith, a homeless man, has been convicted for the brutal murder of UCLA student Brianna Kupfer in 2022. He stabbed her 46 times while she worked alone in a Los Angeles furniture store. The jury found him guilty of murder and using a deadly weapon. A sanity phase will now determine his mental state during the attack.

title: Democrats claiming Florida Senate seat is in play haven't put money behind the effort to make it so
content: Florida Democrats are optimistic about their chances against incumbent Republican Sen. Rick Scott but face a significant funding disadvantage. Debbie Mucarsel-Powell leads the Democratic challenge, focusing on issues like reproductive rights. Despite some grassroots momentum and support from Kamala Harris' campaign, national Democrats have not heavily invested in Florida's costly media markets.
summary: Florida Democrats are optimistic about their chances against incumbent Republican Sen. Rick Scott but face a significant funding disadvantage. Debbie Mucarsel-Powell leads the Democratic challenge, focusing on issues like reproductive rights. Despite some grassroots momentum and support from Kamala Harris' campaign, national Democrats have not heavily invested in Florida's costly media markets.
